channel.title: CVE Feed for IDM Sistemas QSige -- QSige

item.title: CVE-2023-4101|2024-09-23T17:06:19.046Z -- idm%20sistemas%20qsige -- qsige
item.description: The QSige login SSO does not have an access control mechanism to verify whether the user requesting a resource has sufficient permissions to do so. As a prerequisite, it is necessary to log into the application.
